text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: MSI GS65 Stealth THIN-037 15.6" 144 Hz FHD GTX 1070 8 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory M.2 512 SSD Windows 10  64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Valorant. The build quality of the Refurbished: MSI GS65 Stealth THIN-037 15.6" 144 Hz FHD GTX 1070 8 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory M.2 512 SSD Windows 10  64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The build quality of the Refurbished: MSI GS65 Stealth THIN-037 15.6" 144 Hz FHD GTX 1070 8 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory M.2 512 SSD Windows 10  64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the Refurbished: MSI GS65 Stealth THIN-037 15.6" 144 Hz FHD GTX 1070 8 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory M.2 512 SSD Windows 10  64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
